page.title: 10HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: {THE HEALTH CENTRE Situated close to the town centre , the health centre was completed in March 1983. It consists of 11 rooms, 4 of which are doctors surgeries. Other consultants hold clinics within the building these include Obstretrician, Gynaecologist, Orthopaedic, Chiropodist, Speech therapist, Audiometricin. Clinics are also held for child health, anti-natal care, immunisation, child development care and cervical smear tests. There is a comfortable waiting room as consultation is by appointment. The waiting period for patients should not be long. There are toys available for children and a choice of magazines, the walls are cheerfully decorated with a large mural. The centre is open at 8.45 am to 6.30pm Monday to Friday.
